ns2:test-suite.name: Given the login page Testing loginpage,
ns2:test-suite.title: Given the login page Testing loginpage,

test-case.name: Check if corret username and password change the page and shows up success message - Positive
test-case.title: Check if corret username and password change the page and shows up success message - Positive

test-case.name: Check wrong username and password shows up error message - Negative
test-case.title: Check wrong username and password shows up error message - Negative

test-case.name: Check if valid username and invalid password shows up error massage - Negative
test-case.title: Check if valid username and invalid password shows up error massage - Negative

test-case.name: Check if logout and press browser back button return to login page - Negative
test-case.title: Check if logout and press browser back button return to login page - Negative

test-case.name: Check if blank fields shows up error message - Negative
test-case.title: Check if blank fields shows up error message - Negative

test-case.name: Check if userNameLabel and passwordLabel shows up - Positive
test-case.title: Check if userNameLabel and passwordLabel shows up - Positive

test-case.name: Check color flag with wrong login - Negative
test-case.title: Check color flag with wrong login - Negative

test-case.name: Check color flag with correct login - Positive
test-case.title: Check color flag with correct login - Positive

test-case.name: Check if button login works with enter button - Positive
test-case.title: Check if button login works with enter button - Positive

test-case.name: Check if the button logout works on secure page - Positive
test-case.title: Check if the button logout works on secure page - Positive
